text: Great breakfast joint! Incredibly cheap! Great hours! I come here everyday to eat breakfast. There are never any lines and the service is quick and reliable. Definitely try this place. I love how I never to wait and I always get delicious food at a quick pace and a cheap price!

Good place! Good foods  Good prices   Good services.
Philly steak omelette amazing. Home fries great.
Great food at a great price. Try the philly, and the breakfast is awesome,  AND all day. #BREAKFASTATNIGHT

Horrible Sunday morning wait staff. Menu drops on the floor and hands it right to us, no name tags to call out the people providing the horrible service. Not offered refills and served in paper cups! and no steak knife for steak and eggs? Then there was broccoli in my sweet bananas and pancakes,  wasn't much but clearly kitchen is not being cared for properly. I forsee food poisoning in someone's future.

It's off Maryland near UNLV. One of the better cheap eats in town. We had breakfast panini and burrito for only $4.99.  They open at 7 a.m. Monday through Friday and 9 a.m. on weekends. Pretty decent sized portions and the service is quick and professional.

Tried this place this morning with some friends and it was great. The price was the best part, being college students. The service was fast and friendly. I would definitely recommend if you're looking for a good breakfast spot!

More people need to know about this place! Delicious, clean, and cheap. Definitely more options than having lunch or breakfast on campus. They also have delicious sweet treats. Super closed to campus.
Really good food, college student friendly prices, and good service. I eat here about 3 times a week. It's a perfect go to for right after or before class.

Great inexpensive place for breakfast. I know they do a ton of delivery orders for Uber and others. I had the steak and eggs. Steak was cooked a perfect tender Med and eggs were also done poached and right on the mark. Most places can't get poached eggs right and they nailed it! Got a awesome bowl of fresh blueberries, strawberries, cantalop and honey few melon instead of toast for .50 more. Only negative were the potatoes as they were the deep fried variety rather than a more typical home fries I was expecting. No military or student discounts even though they are across the street from UNLV. Service was good and friendly too!
What's not to like about this place for breakfast. Solid basics. Eggs cooked properly and bacon. Only wheat toast but delicious bread. And good coffee. Simple and cheap. I liked it.
Ordered through Uber eats. The food arrived fast. Delicious breakfast will order again.

If you are a college student on a budget looking for breakfast, then this place fits the bill nicely.  You can get basic, no-frills breakfast food for very reasonable prices, far more reasonable than you would find at a Denny's or other breakfast-type places.  Plus, it is right across the street from the UNLV campus. 

The restaurant itself, like the menu, is very basic and simple.  It has classic hole-in-the-wall restaurant Formica booths and benches, with a few tables in the center. There's nothing fancy about it, and it seems a bit dingy. But you would not go to a place like this for the ambiance! 

I ordered one of the basic omlettes with toast and had no complaints. There was plenty of food there, for around $5.  Looking at the menu, it seems they serve many other kinds of food as well, for pretty reasonable prices. With a bit of advertising, this place would be a lot more crowded. Hopefully they will continue to be successful. 

Overall, for breakfast at least, this is a cost-effective and tasty place to eat.

I'm giving 5 stars 
If you want a place off the strip to eat that isn't $$$$ then this is your place. They have all kinds off food. 
This place was very clean, easy to get to, fast service, friendly workers and good food. 
The cheese steak sandwich was super good. 
My kids good a number *11. Pancakes eggs bacon hash browns. $7.00 Thai tea is made fresh and very tasty. 
Food was great and the price is very cheap. 
Recommend you will be happy.

Perfect eggs
The lines in Vrada were stupidly long. 
Pancakes  
 potatoes  toast.
Delivered to my hotel.
Perfect

Visitors to Vegas get off the strip and check out this local cafe and enjoy a great home style cooked breakfast for a great price. Friendly and quick staff with a great cook and best prices I have seen in years. Come check this place out.

Popped in for a quick breakfast with my parents as I was in the area and in this part of town. The service is so so and the food to be honest is quite low quality but I guess you can get away with it for breakfast. The regular coffee is decent and I had the Chorizo omelette  also decent. The thing about this place is its quick and easy. Great for the unlv students. I wouldn't come back because I'd prefer to pay more for better quality food.
It's low budget but beautifully arranged with comfortable seats and easy atmosphere. The food is very tasty with healthy options. I would come back here regularly if I lived in the area.
Great coffee, excellent service, very clean, the owner is super nice! I always come for breakfast and they are very fast.

If you're looking for good breakfast and lunch and you have low budget, go here. The foods are awesome, the pricing is low and the staffs are so nice!

Highly recommended!!

Good size portions, big size for breakfast I would say. The location is not very convenient and sure it's hard to compete with everything strip offers. But it was a good breakfast for decent price and nice service. And they were open for thanksgiving and I know lots of small places are not.

My husband and I are staying at La Quinta in Las Vegas which has a free breakfast. When we went down the place was packed so we decided to Yelp and find another opportunity. This place had good ratings so we decided to go. Excellent decision! Food is yummy and well priced. Service was friendly and super fast. Highly recommend.
Good food for a reasonable price, had the steak and eggs, fried potatoes, and toast for 9.99. Very clean inside and no problem with parking

The service is amazing and so is the food. The place recently opened up near UNLV, so if you're a student in UNLV it's a 3 minute walk, pretty much. What I really enjoy about this place, is not just the service, but the food prices too. It's affordable!
We're visiting Las Vegas and so glad to have found this place. I loved my Asian Nutella Crepes. They're only  $4.99 and surprisingly taste so good! The workers are friendly as well.
Good food good value. Service is a little slow when busy but it's well worth the wait
Well made breakfast at a reasonable price.  The owner is very nice and the service is great.  I particularly like the chorizo omelet!
Came in for breakfast, the breakfast potatoes and French toast were fabulous. Everything else we had was good- but those were definitely the showstoppers!

Eggs were fresh and French toast pretty good. Table was not clean, as we discovered after being seated.  Price is very reasonable and the staff is very nice.  Pedestrian bacon and sausage.  Jelly with high fructose corn syrup plus whipped "spread" not butter.  Orange juice in Tropicana bottle.  Uber eats popular.  Around UNLV campus.
Very good quality food, very reasonable prices, clean and friendly. Excellent for breakfast
Last minute pick, ate there this weekend food is pretty good and very reasonably priced. Would definitely go back!!

The waitress had the gall to tell me "there is no money in your account"my balance $4400. Then I had to use the men's room-the cook broke in-so as I was leaving he was screaming and cursing. I think metro should close them down
I came for lunch and the food was great.   Pricing was low. Food portions were perfect. I had the chicken wrap and my friend had steak and eggs.   I recommend both dishes

This place just opened up near campus, and it is so great! The staff is really nice and food is delicious. Not to mention the prices are perfect for their portion sizes. Very large portion sizes. I recommend to get chicken and waffles, only 6.99. Super fluffy waffles and crispy chicken. My friends will come around here every week or so.

Place is mostly reasonably priced 
I got the pho 
Tastes exactly like beef maruchan 
Would not recommend 
Pho should be taken off the menu
But it seems like everyone comes here for philly cheese steaks 
They should make a simpler menu in my opinion

This will not go down as an all time favorite... Had been school shipping nearby and really wanted a juicy burger...... Heyyyyyy stop near a college campus, always a good burger joint.....not so much.  Perhaps their chinese food is good as this appears to really be first a chinese restaurant and than secondary someone got smart and said serve breakfast and lunch items across from a college campus...lil one once again had waffle( he was happy) other had steak and butterfly shrimp( this was not a quality item) the salmon sandwich looked good, but that is not what she ordered... Ended up doing a chicken wrap and she was quite satisfied... Just remember this is NOT a burger joint....i do love steak fries though

Don't waste your money. This place is a joke. I waited 20 Minutes for 2 eggs and they came out cold and undercooked. I didn't even get a refund. Everyone else (maybe 3 other customers they had) also had problems. They refunded one guy. Not one person didn't complain when I was in there. 

And undercooked, cold eggs? You people are going to make someone sick. 

Can we get the health department in here please?

Dropped by here this morning not really sure what I was looking for, but Chipotle was closed so I thought "why not?"

The place was pretty clean and they served breakfast, lunch, and dinner all day which is a HUGE plus for those of us that work graveyard and are sick of breakfast food everyday, ha!

I ended up getting the 'The Godfather Burger' which came on an egg bun and was delicious! I had to stop half way through and take a picture ha! I wanted to sample the special sauce, which is normally made with cabbage (which I hate) so they even made up a special little batch for me!

Probably the best thing about this whole experience was the price. It only cost me $7.48 for a full meal, can't beat that!

The entire menu is well priced and the breakfast items are delicious! I've been here multiple times and never been disappointed. I like the breakfast bagel sandwich with bacon. The crepes are great too! Service is always friendly and attentive and I will continue to eat here untill I graduate.

Perfect for students or anyone on a budget. Do it.

Whats going on with this place? Is this fast food or sit down? Im so confused when i walk into the door. Im somewhere in the middle. This place has good marketing potential towards broke college students and thats about it. The philly cheese steak sandwich was okay. There was only one person running the entire front line. I feel bad for her. I hope she gets backup soon. She was doing everything for everyone. Im willing to bet there was only one chef in the back too. The only reason i went here was because the company advertises well on the back of their building on that banner way up high

This place was close to the airport so we thought we would give it a try. The food was okay but the smoothies were delicious! We had a breakfast wrap, pancakes and egg and bagel sandwich. It was cheap eats and seemed to be a favorite for UNLV students. 

The decor and atmosphere was strange because I am convinced it was/is a Chinese restaurant in another life. The woman that was the entire staff was busting her butt to get all orders taken, bills paid and restocking coolers!

This place was great! Messed up my order a little bit but what I go still tasted great. Food is made well, prices are super affordable, the waitress was super sweet and apologetic about my order. Offered to take it off my check but I said no because what I got was still good and I still ate it, but generous of her to offer. 
Overall, definitely my new breakfast spot when I'm on this side of town. I love the  small diner atmosphere.

I wish the food quality was a little higher. Had the chicken and waffle. The waffle was a frozen waffle, and the hash brown was a cheap frozen potato patty that was deep fried. That is why I removed one star otherwise the service and the prices are fantastic. And the place is impeccably clean.

Every year I go to Vegas and work at the Rio for the World Series of Poker. This year, I decided to fly instead of drive, so I was sans car while staying next door at the Gold Coast. I was stoked to find out UberEats had free delivery for a limited time, and Breakfast & Grill Cafe was on their list. They have ridiculously cheap breakfast, so a few days ago I got a $4 bagel sandwich, and today I got a $7 platter which included 3 slices of French toast, 2 eggs, sausage, and hash browns. Both meals were delicious and great value. I dunno if I'd ever go into the restaurant itself, but as long as they're on UberEats, I'll be ordering when I'm in town!

Right across from UNLV, budget-friendly food, and fantastic service keeps me coming back here! I have been going here all semester long as a place to hide and study, and after trying several menu items, I am yet to be disappointed. The staff is really friendly and they seem to get a ton of business from UberEats as drivers are constantly walking in and out of the place. But if you're looking for a cheap and decent place to get breakfast or lunch near campus, then look no further!

This is a great family run restaurant. Went to 2 other places and each had over an 1.5 hour wait. Looked up this location and walked right in and a sat down. It was busy, filled with locals and service was fast and really good. If you like good local places you have to check this one out.

This is my third time trying this place, this being my third, overall a nice place to eat. However I ordered a myob (make your own burrito) I asked for no cheese, it came with cheese I tried to pick the cheese out but it was melted into the egg. I felt nausea and sick to my stomach after, unfortunately, I will not be coming back. (No stars for me).

A bit of an identity crisis this place is...

Let me get some Pho with a side of french toast, or not. Threw me off with the menu venturing into Pho after being 90% american style breakfast and lunch items. Either way i was looking for a quick and cheap bite on my way to the Pinball Hall of Fame and stopped here. I asked my waiter what to eat and suggested the Godfather meal and it came out fast. Good sized burger with thick steak fries (i like skinny & crispy), and a drink. I drink water so no soda, and if you like thick fries then you should get a meal, i like skinny so i should have just ordered a burger alone. The burger was straight forward, not top quality meat but good enough for the price and with fresh vegetables on top. For $5.99 i was pleased enough to write a review. 

I would like to comment on my waiter. He was a young man that i didn't get the name of but i wish more people worked like this guy. Very tentative, super friendly, but what really impressed me is that even when he didn't have anything to do he was finding something. Constantly wiping things down, stocking the drink fridge, and just trying to stay busy. Thank you sir, i appreciate that.
Really good breakfast!  I had the bagel sandwich and the wife has an omelette.  Fast, good prices and the girl behind the counter was really nice. The coffee is ok and the place is clean.
For UNLV students its probably the best food option out there. They have large selection, cheap prices and the wait staff is very nice
The food here was delicious.  The bacon was perfect, and the blueberry pancakes were marvelous.

See, I told y'all I would be back to review, in my original review I said this place has POTENTIAL.  This is a very true statement to me, yea it was kind of a bumpy start with them BUT I continued to visit the Breakfast & Grill Café nonetheless. 

This could possibly be to GO TO spot for fresh made-to-order salads.  Scratch that, this is the GO TO spot for fresh made-to-order salads.  They have a salad bar with over 20 fresh fixings to choose from, start with your LETTUCE/GREENS BED and go from there.  Lettuce/Greens options are Organic Romaine, Spring Mix and Spinach.

So this is how it works:  you have a salad card (just like the sushi card, check off the sushi you want, etc, etc)

Pick 2 GREENS
Pick 8 FIXINGS (this includes cheeses as well)
Pick and MEATS @ EXTRA $1-$3
Pick 2 DRESSINGS

Check off your selections and hand the card to the person behind the counter.

If you read my reviews, you know I am very big on FREASHNESS and REAL product, FARM to TABLE is the best.  I combined the following for my salad extravaganza.

Spinach and Field Greens mixed w/ bean sprouts, mushrooms, corn, red onion, feta, beets and avocado all for $6.48.  I love salads, so I'm in wonderland over here, I can create a different salad every day.  Looking for a healthy meal alternative and you live, work, attend or just in the neighborhood you should check this place out.  Oh this is no baby salad here, enough to feed 3 or you have 3 meals, and I did: lunch YESTERDAY, dinner LAST NIGHT and lunch TODAY once again all for $6.48.

It's not all about salads at the Breakfast & Grill Café, the have great breakfast and lunch specials, I just had to HIGHLIGHT the salad bar.  "I got my life (snap,snap)"  and this is why I had to update my review

While at UNLV for an event, the hubby got hungry We had no idea where to go and googled this cute place Called Breakfast and Grill Place.  The prices are ridiculously right the food is amazing and the service superb!!!!!  If you are on a budget and Love good delicious food this is your place!!!!!  Must try Ann's coffee .  All and all simple food and great service!!!!

This place is family run and always worth the money...they do a huge take out service as well ... I have had the breakfast sandwich  very good.
I have had the chicken wrap (excellent) and the parm fries, both excellent.  
Coffee is so so

Calling all UNLV students! Looking for a no-frills, affordable place for breakfast or lunch? This is it. Simple breakfast items. They offer vegetarian options. Have had their French toasts, chicken sausages, and chicken wraps (only $4.50!). Cheap and gets the job done. Not overly busy inside so service is quick and friendly. Good sized portions. What more is there?

Went to eat breakfast here for the first time and the food was HORRIBLE. Everything was cold, the pancakes were dry, they didn't know how to make over easy eggs and asked for cheese on top and they put two slices of sandwich cheese on top, the cheese wouldn't even melt. The food also had my first running to the bathroom right after. That was our first and last time there...
Great little place the service was excellent and they had clean restrooms. We had a full breakfast for two for under twenty dollars drinks included. I highly recommend this place.

Looks to be a locals favorite.  Decent breakfast and expansive variety on the sandwiches.  I did not care for the fact that they do not have decaf coffee.  That was a bummer.  I had 2 eggs, hashbrown, bacon, and waffle.  It was all good but not high quality.  Bacon was paper thin and small.  My friend had the chorizo breakfast burrito and it was really good.  They also deliver using grubhub and uber eat.  Waitress was very nice and customer focused.

I care here in between classes one day with my friends. This place is conveniently located in the same plaza as chipotle and they cater very well to UNLV students.
There is a lack of breakfast on campus and my friends and I were in the mood for breakfast. 
I ordered the potato platter, on of my friends ordered the breakfast platter, and the other ordered the breakfast burrito.
They are very attentive here and friendly, and the food came out super quickly. 
The potato platter was okay. There's nothing amazing about it but it was extremely convenient for breakfast. 
Kaylin absolutely loved her breakfast burrito. It came with a deliciously spicy salsa that I wish I was given the option of having when asking for salsa.
Roxie loved her breakfast platter and though the pancakes were large and too much to eat, so I gladly assisted her in eating one of her pancakes. 
This is a very standard breakfast spot. But due to their convenience to campus this place is great for students due to their speed.

Happy Eating!

I really enjoy this place a lil sweet diner ..i love lil places like this ... Mom and pops type lil place ... Phillys are tasty and theses shakes oh man !!!lofl im sold on the shakes ...dont leave this place without trying a shake i got vanilla and strawberry with chocolate syrup man im tellin u im in love if your hungry and want a nice hardy meal i defently recommend...i have to say this is comfort food forsure hits me in the core ...o love eating out lol its kinda my weakness

Very clean, nice location, great customer service, food is hot and prices incredibly reasonable. There could be a little more flavor but other than that I will be back it's a nice little sit down place. They have wifi which is great.
This place has Good food and quick service . A must see in Las Vegas . And conveniently located next to everything ! If you haven't been here before you must come in today

The food here is great and reasonably priced. Service was fast and friendly. I highly recommend the philly cheesesteak it was so delicious we returned today for another one. My hubby loves the breakfast here too! Stop by this little place you wont ne sorry!
Great food and affordable.  Lots of options.  My medium rare steak was cooked perfectly and my scrambled eggs were good too.  $10 for steak and eggs was a great buy.
Small strip mall location, but service was good and the food was very good. They took less than five minutes to get my to go order made.  Help this small business grow and thrive!

Was here this past Friday morning. The wait was long but we lucked out by the calling ahead so it saved us a lot of time. Service was prompt and the food was good. Their potatoes were good a little over seasoned but overall good. Will be back on the next trip.
The home fries were some of the best I've ever had, the food was warm even when it was delivered, everything was very tasty.

This is a simple breakfast spot, I really enjoyed my breakfast here and I enjoyed the prices even more. $5.99 for my waffles with fresh fruit and $6.99 for my boyfriends meal. The portions are generous, especially my serving of fresh fruit. It was just what I was craving. I like to support the little hole-in-the-wall small restaurants and this is one that I'll be returning to. Our server was sweet, pleasant service. It wasn't busy when we went only a few other diners. The menu isn't gourmet, like I said, it's simple, like comfort food. Less commercialized than iHop and more of a little family-owned spot. I dig it.

One of the best and silliest places I've eaten in years. My wife and I were wandering around UNLV and decided to look for something to eat. We went in with pretty low expectations and ended up having a great time. 

These guys have everything, and I do mean everything. Pancakes? Check. Burgers? Check. Mexican food? Check. Orange Chicken bowl with yakisoba noodles? Sure, why not!?

We had a Gyro and philly chesesteak. While I wouldnt say the food was mind blowingly delicious, the taste/price ratio is insane. Two lunches, fries, and drinks, turned out to be around $15. Service was good. For that, I cant give anything less than 5 stars.
The food here was amazing. The owner was super nice and was really helpful. The chicken strips were delicious!

What a super duper nice owner and staff!  And a totally decent breakfast staff!  Visit 1 the owner took very good personalized care of me! I met her daughter Ann and their server Anthony. Smart super friendly and right on top of things. If you are near UNLV please give this place a chance. You will be glad you did. .  Scott

Cozy place and food is what you'd expect. The like potato chip hash? It was really fun to see and eat. Would be so good with some sour cream on the side though.

Service is great especially the young man (wish i got his name! but he was short and had gelled dark hair) serving coffee asked us if we needed more water so he literally left and came back with a water pitcher within a min. Quick service.

Was a little skeptic of the menu. Such a wide selection. How can they be good at everything. Was with a group, and we all got a different entree so we can share and taste family style. EVERYTHING was good! And our server was very pleasant, as I am sure we were a handful to deal with :)

My partner and I were debating on eating here. Instead of Chipotle. I saw their "build your own salad". I thought it sounded like a great idea and it was. Even though, they were out of few things. I was not going to judge them for that. The salad still came out great. The chicken was bomb.com. My partner got a yellow chicken curry bowl. He said the chicken was not the best quality because his chicken was precooked. He still liked it and i agreed. Cool thing about it too. That this place is affordable for 3 meals with big portions. I wish I had take a picture. Very good meal and didn't take long to get our food.

The lady who helped us was very nice. She did politely let us know on what certain things they were out of. The place was clean and organized. Oh! The welcoming was excellent to hear. It is great to see that they have a menu outside. So it gives people the decision on what to eat before entering. I agree that it is a great place for unlv students to come and eat. 

I definitely will recommend people to come here.

This place just opened. I think they need to figure out their identity, each sign I see has a different name. It's very clean inside, which I was concerned about as the previous business was not. I ordered the steak salad and liked it more than I thought I would. She did ask for a preference in the doneness, I specified medium rare, but the slices were on the thin side so it came out medium well/well, but I was still happy with it. Overall, it was pleasant experience, and I'll be back.

We went there for breakfast. 

Our meal for five people was $22. What more can I say? This included 4 small breakfasts (2 eggs, toast, and bacon), a big breakfast (can't remember what it included), a coffee, and an orange juice. 

When we pulled up to this breakfast joint, were were a little nervous. It's not appealing on the outside, and honestly it's not on the inside either. It wasn't the cleanest place and the smell was terrible. Again, the food wasn't bad and it was cheap. We would probably come back for breakfast again when we visit Vegas. It is a little drive from the strip, but we did not want to pay $20 for breakfast in our hotel or anywhere on the strip. It's crazy how expensive it can be! The service was good and it wasn't too crowded at 9:30-10:30 either.

Great breakfast. Had the steak and spinach omelette- steak was tender and nicely cooked. Was able to swap sliced tomatoes for the potatoes. Wife had Philly omelette, was pleased and said the hash browns potatoes were cooked just right.  Service was good and ambience music nice.

I asked for my waffle to be extra crispy...um, I have had pancakes that had more texture.  Oh...and the maple syrup had to be shared amongst tables...but I guess I didn't have to worry about my waffle getting soggy...although gah I didn't even eat 1/4.  Had to go to Tiabi down the street to eat afterwards.  Love Tiabi...should have gone there from the beginning...

Go next door for coffee if you want something with more flavor. 

On the upside, my husband's big breakfast was good...sausage patty was tasty and moist...hence the two stars.

We ate here with our kids on a trip to Vegas. We try to get off the strip to eat and saw this on yelp so decided to give it a try. It's across from UNLV. It's a small place with maybe 10 booths/tables.The prices were really good and so was the food. There was only one person working both as the server and cashier but we still got our food pretty quickly. Only downside was the credit card machine was down so my husband had to leave to get cash.

Very reasonably priced. The food was good but not great, if that makes sense. I would come back if I'm craving breakfast food but don't want to spend the cash. The restaurant itself was clean and the waitresses were very attentive. It wasn't busy considering it is right across the street of UNLV.
I ordered a breakfast sandwich using Postmates. In the special instructions I put No meat- just egg and cheese. This is what I got. ?

Not a serious breakfast place.  Margarine, prefab hash browns, tasteless coffee in paper cups.  Inexpensive.  If you want a cheap breakfast, this is your spot.  If you want a nice breakfast, keep looking.  Nice people that are clearly trying hard.
